education: Long Hu is a lecturer in School of Computer Science and Technology at Huazhong University of Science and Technology (HUST). He has also received his Master and B.S. degree in HUST. He is the Publication Chair for 4th International Conference on Cloud Computing (CloudComp 2013). Currently, his research includes 5G Mobile Communication System, Big Data Mining, Marine-Ship Communication, Internet of Things, and Multimedia Transmission over Wireless Network, etc.
